-LRwieuVN-87kdRWvb9m.text: We really do need more halibut, and fewer carp, to make this world a better place. We have too much symmetry going on.

-LSBOfyuRedK-C60eGuA.text: Do we get to make comments? And edit them without errors?

-LSGv6lbgnicB1qsV4X0.text: Phew that was close... I thought it was odd when I saw camel case "timeStamp" earlier today, then this afternoon it created a bug! It may be a bit odd, but timestamp should be treated as one word and the "stamp" part should never be capitalized. Diverging from this pattern can create bugs like that.

-LSRFMiL0L40aFBbltGU.text:
Found a bug...
Clicking Edit body > making a change in body > deciding not to save change > clicking "x" = Check save button remains visible > goes away only when clicking check button or refreshing page

-LXq4dIkzGoGLxUJbKBI.text: I hope that the improved UX and indicators make things more clear - that clicking "x" just closes that particular edit menu and to revert the changes without saving you need to refresh or push the reset button on the save flag...

Ak0L1w0estRNrJwGn5fNk2mYpZk2.bio: Ponderous and purposeful, I watch the mangoes fall and the gnats rise. The jungle is a petri dish and you, my friend, are a fine specimen.
